identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Tactical Fintech' experience that balances trust with high-performance precision. Avoid generic admin panel vibes.

theme.description: A deep, warm black base with high-precision accents. Trust is conveyed through stability (dark grays) and clarity (vibrant data points).

navigation.mobile: Bottom Navigation Bar - Fixed, high blur (backdrop-blur-xl)

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards to allow data to breathe.

cards.style: bg-zinc-900 border border-zinc-800 rounded-xl hover:border-zinc-700 transition-colors shadow-sm

buttons.primary: bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-500 text-white rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(99,102,241,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-zinc-800 hover:bg-zinc-700 text-white border border-zinc-700 rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium

inputs.style: bg-zinc-950 border-zinc-800 focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-indigo-500 rounded-lg text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600

charts.style: Minimal axes, custom dark tooltip (bg-zinc-900 border-zinc-800), rounded bars

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Dark Mode is the DEFAULT. Ensure all base components render correctly in dark mode first.
Use 'lucide-react' for icons. Pick thin, crisp icons.
Navigation: Implement a Sidebar for Desktop (md:flex) and a Bottom Nav for Mobile (md:hidden).
Auth Page: Use a Split Layout. Left 40% Form, Right 60% Image (Use the 'auth_hero' image).
Dashboard: Use a Bento Grid layout. Do not stack everything vertically on desktop.
Data Formatting: ALL currency must be formatted as 'R$ 1.234,56' (pt-BR locale). Dates as 'dd/MM/yyyy'.
Charts: Use 'recharts'. Style them to match the dark theme (no white backgrounds on tooltips).
Interactivity: Add hover states to all rows in tables and cards.
Animations: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and card entrance animations (staggered).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
